fields.name: **Scenario**:
fields.value:
Rookie Hunt
*The rookie is gonna rat us out any minute. We can't kill him directly, or people will start suspecting us. We need to find another way.*

fields.name: Factional Traits:
fields.value:
- The Corrupt Cops will consist of a Jaded Chief and two Officers
- The Corrupt Cops (except the Rookie) win by killing all who oppose them AND having the Rookie dead
- The Corrupt Cops (except the Rookie) have a factional chat
- The Corrupt Cops know the roles of all Corrupt Cops, including knowing who the Rookie is. The Rookie has no clue who the Corrupt Cops are.
- The Corrupt Cops cannot kill the Rookie
- The Corrupt Cops' factional kill is Powerful and they clean their target

-

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, you can Investigate a player, learning if they are good or bad. If you see a Corrupt Cop, you will bypass any detection immunity they have.
- After night 3, you can shoot one player. If you shoot anyone other than a Corrupt Cop, you kill yourself out of guilt.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Appear suspicious to other players (Appears as an Officer for all purposes)
- Cannot perform the Factional Kill
- If the Rookie dies, all Corrupt Cops appear innocent from now on
